item.title: Looking Back to 2020: PROVEHITO IN ALTUM
item.description: It’s mid-2021, and this post, which is supposed to come out in Janurary, is finally complete. 2020 is a special year, both for the whole world and me. After consideration, I still believe that it deserve some record and hindsight for myself. See Further Â Entering the university, the courses, complicated and difficult, provide more higher perspective in understanding and analyzing than challenges. I had ever tried to apply transformations on image with GDI+, where all the adjustments made, like changes in brightness or saturation, are expressed in what’s called a transforming matrix.
